amendment.description: To increase funding for the SBA's programs such as Microloans, Small Business Development Centers, Women's Business Centers, the HUBZone program and other small business programs and to offset the cost through a reduction in funds under function 150 for foreign microloans and other programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 216 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Snowe.

vote.text: Amendment SA 216 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
